hero.description: Your name will echo through the ages. Join the Crimson Legacy and become part of a family whose legends will be told for generations. Your story starts here.

about.title: About Crimson Legacy
about.p1: Born from the ashes of countless battles, Crimson Legacy emerged as a beacon of hope in the chaotic world of Rise of Kingdoms. What began as a small group of determined warriors has evolved into a legendary family that commands respect across the battlefield.
about.p2: Our story is one of unbreakable bonds, strategic brilliance, and unwavering loyalty. We've faced the mightiest kingdoms and emerged victorious, not through sheer force, but through the power of unity and tactical excellence.
about.p3: Today, we stand as a testament to what can be achieved when individual strength combines with collective purpose. We are not just warriors—we are a family forged in fire.

verso.title: Chief Advisor of Crimson Legacy
verso.desc: Manages external diplomacy and alliance relations. Also responsible for territory planning in KVK and home kingdom, working closely with territory officers across the family.

oldmanchewy.desc: Leads the Blades alliance. Key decision-maker in family-wide leadership and war planning.

suad.name: Suad
suad.desc: Acts under Pryda's direct command. Executes high-priority tasks with loyalty and precision.

nox.name: Nox
nox.desc: Supports Chewy in operations and event execution. Fully involved in leadership decisions across the family.

draculla.name: Draculla
draculla.desc: Oversees all alliances during events, tracks performance, gives strategic support, and ensures the whole family pushes together for top rankings and rewards.

nyx.name: Nyx
nyx.desc: Monitors all alliances for rule-breaking or internal issues. Maintains order and reports to leadership.

pyhrex.name: Pyhrex
pyhrex.desc: Executes flag placement and tech planning for the family under Verso's coordination. Key role in war prep, territory control and research efficiency.

eliteAlliances.title: Our Elite Alliances
eliteAlliances.subtitle: Two legendary alliances working in perfect harmony to dominate kingdoms and create an unstoppable force

knights.title: Crimson Knights
knights.desc: The unbreakable shield of our family. These legendary defenders have mastered the art of protecting what matters most. Their cities stand as impenetrable fortresses, their resources flow like rivers, and their support keeps the entire family strong.

blades.title: Crimson Blades
blades.desc: The relentless sword of our family. These legendary warriors strike with unmatched precision and courage. Their victories inspire the family, their tactics shape our destiny, and their unity forges our path to greatness.

familyCulture.title: Our Family Culture
familyCulture.description: Beyond the battlefield, Crimson Legacy is built on values that create lasting bonds and legendary achievements. Our culture is the foundation of our success and the reason we remain undefeated.

values.unityDescription: We believe that individual strength is amplified when combined with collective purpose. Every member contributes to our shared success.
values.strategyDescription: Every battle is won before it begins. We value strategic thinking, careful planning, and tactical execution over brute force alone.
values.loyaltyDescription: Loyalty is the cornerstone of our family. We stand by each other through victories and defeats, knowing that our bonds are unbreakable.
values.excellenceDescription: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from individual performance to collective achievements. Mediocrity has no place in our family.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Crimson Legacy

questions.question: What makes Crimson Legacy different from other alliances?
questions.answer: Crimson Legacy is built on a foundation of family values, strategic excellence, and unwavering loyalty. We focus on creating lasting bonds while achieving legendary success in the game.

questions.question: How active do I need to be to join?
questions.answer: We expect regular participation in events and family activities. While we understand real life comes first, we look for members who can contribute consistently to our collective success.

questions.question: What are the requirements for joining?
questions.answer: We look for players who value loyalty, strategy, and family. Experience level varies, but we prioritize character and commitment over power level alone.

questions.question: How do I apply to join Crimson Legacy?
questions.answer: Contact us through Discord or in-game to express your interest. We'll guide you through our application process and help you get started.

questions.question: What kind of support can I expect as a member?
questions.answer: You'll have access to our experienced leadership team, strategic guidance, training resources, and the support of the entire Crimson Legacy family.
